name: Panic! At The Hospital A Twine Piece
name_original: Panic! At The Hospital A Twine Piece
description:
Panic! At The Hospital is a text based resource management game that is made in Twine. It was made as part of a series assignments I was given in my second year of Game Design. It is all about helping a person manage their anxiety levels. 

This assignment taught me how to use sugarcube and the basics of CSS
